headline: CMP Scientific Announces Dr. Darlene Solomon to Advise on Strategy and Technology
summary: BROOKLYN, N.Y., September 08, 2025--CMP Scientific, a leader in capillary electrophoresis–mass spectrometry (CE-MS) technology, today announced the appointment of Dr. Darlene Solomon, former Chief Technology Officer and Senior Vice President of Agilent Technologies, and member of the National Academy of Engineering as external Executive Advisor of Strategy and Technology.
